EmailTemplate.description: Email to ATS Team when case communication is true
EmailTemplate.name: Case Creation Acknowledgement To Aero Tech Support
EmailTemplate.subject: Action required- CASE not created- Please Use the Honeywell Aerospace Portal for Technical Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Technical Support. Due to recent process improvements your request must be submitted via our 24/7 technical support portal. This portal provides easy and efficient access for customer support, technical knowledge articles and videos, publications and other valuable product support resources.
Log-in and Contact Technical Support
If you do not currently have a Honeywell Aerospace portal account, please register here and proceed to submit your support request via our contact-us form.
Donâ€™t want to wait for an answer? Visit our robust Technical Knowledge Center, and quickly find the self-help technical support resources that will address your question.
Again, thank you for contacting us and accessing the Honeywell Aerospace portal for valuable support resources.
